column4: Hey all I know this isn't exactly and ubuntu question but im about to run dual boot so its kind of applicable. Do you know how I can make a bootable Pen drive so I can install my emergency tinyxp install off of it incase I need a familiar os when i get stuck on ubuntu.
theres wiki/howto guides for that on google.. and torrent sites ive seen.
yeah im yet to find a decent one yet will jump in the windows channel
i use ubuntu ion a thubmdruive as a rescue system. :)
